To verify the dlc's present in the game, open the game, at the interface menu select 'Additional Content' and then select 'Acquired Content' , list of present dlc's will be shown....

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS :

Open 'Watch Dogs repack Mr DJ.part1' using WinRar and extract the setup folder to any location, open the extracted folder.... 

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT),, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup, Click on next, specify the directory where you want to install the game and then click on next, again next, make sure 'Create a desktop icon' checkbox is ticked and then click on next and finally click on install .... after setup completes, Direct X and Visual C++ updates will install, open the game from desktop shortcut....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from ingame options and make sure your graphics card drivers are updated.
